wobbly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: moving unsteadily from side to side
wobbly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if you or your legs feel wobbly, you feel weak and unable to keep your balance
wobbly.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a wobbly voice is weak and shakes, especially because you feel frightened or upset
wobbly.translation[0].definitions[3].def: not very good or not likely to be successful
wobbly.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The meeting yesterday got off to a wobbly start.
